questions.question: H2 has sent a broadcast msg to all of the hosts. If host H1 wants to reply to the broadcast msg,which statement is true?

choices.answer: H1 sends a unicast message to H2, but the switch forwards it to all devices
H1 sends a broadcast message to H2, and the switch forwards it to all
H1 sends a unicast message to H2, and the switch forwards it directly to H2
H1 sends a multicast msg to H2, and the switch forwards it directly to H2

questions.question: Which action is taken by a Layer 2 switch when it receives a Layer 2 broadcast frame?

choices.answer: It drops the frame.
It sends frame to all ports except the port on which it received the frame
It sends the frame to all ports that are registered to forward broadcasts.
It sends the frame to all ports.

questions.question: What is the destination MAC address of the Ethernet frame as it leaves the web server if the final destination is PC1?
On Ethernet networks, the hexadecimal address FF-FF-FF-FF-FF-FF represents the ______ MAC address.

choices.answer: unicast
multicast
broadcast

questions.question: PC1 issues an ARP request because it needs to send a packet to PC3. In this scenario, what will happen next?

choices.answer: RT1 will forward the ARP request to PC3.
RT1 will send an ARP reply with the PC3 MAC address.
RT1 will send an ARP reply with its own Fa0/0 MAC address.
SW1 will send an ARP reply with its Fa0/1 MAC address.

questions.question: When the store&forward method of switching is in use, what part of the Ethernet frame is used to perform an error check?

choices.answer: CRC in the trailer
destination MAC address in the header
source MAC address in the header
protocol type in the header

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of ARP?

choices.answer: translate URLs to IP addresses
provide dynamic IP configuration to network devices
resolve IPv4 addresses to MAC addresses
convert internal private addresses to external public addresses

questions.question: The Ethernet _______ sublayer is responsible for communicating directly with the physical layer.

choices.answer: MAC
LLC

questions.question: What happens to runt frames received by a Cisco Ethernet switch?

choices.answer: The frame is dropped.
The frame is broadcast to all other devices on the same network.
The frame is returned to the originating network device.
The frame is sent to the default gateway.
It defines the most common LAN type in the world.
It defines a standard model used to describe how networking works.
It is the required Layer 1 and 2 standard for Internet communication.
It connects multiple sites such as routers located in different countries.
